root: ^Hello Isaac, I came as soon as I can.
^And as promised, I finished the bouquet, worked on it all night.
^Oh wow, it's really pretty Hanae. I can see all your effort and talent went into this bouquet.
^This bouquet came out nice also because of you.
^These flowers are all here because you wanted to do something for special for Kat. Not to mention the Blue Flowers represent a part of you in this arrangement.
^I-I guess when you put it that way, I can sort of see that.
